programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep115116
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46854686
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2076
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3660
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep168
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep110
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Taichung Player(M) Ep4647
programme.desc: Chin-Lan Chang & Top Social Media Infulencer travel & explore Taichong!

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep460
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Lost Romance(M) Ep12
programme.desc: Xiao-En Zheng is an ordinary editor for romance novels who always dreams that one day a rich hunk would come and save her. One of her enjoyable times is to peek out the window to see Tian-Xing He, who is a CEO working in the next building. Her world changes completely when an accident occurs. She time travels into her novel. Not knowing where she is, she sees Tian-Xing He walking towards her.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: Miao Miao is an awkward young beauty who nevertheless enchants her outgoing classmate Xiao Ai. As Xiao Ais feelings for Miao Miao grows from friendship to something more, Miao Miao discovers her own burgeoning attraction to a sullen CD store owner, and quietly pursues him.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Rogers family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Rus financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the clients data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kongs elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Hello Babies
programme.desc: Lui Ming and Yeung Wai are constantly fighting with each other on everything, and now they are competing to be the first to get a grandson. Lui hires the Super Star midwife Gong San to supervise their sons and nephews to make it happen

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the teams downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: When a cancer-ridden criminal sets out to seek vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime syndicates, police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung Sang finds himself pulled into a 72-hour battle of wits and courage.

programme.title: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie
programme.desc: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Fleet of Time
programme.desc: A coming-of-age tale about a group of close friends from high school, college and eventually reaching adulthood through the 1990s and 2000s. They meet again at a friend's wedding in 2014 and recall their romantic past through memories.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: First Love the Litter on the Breeze
programme.desc: This movie is the directorial debut of actor Eric Kot for Wong Kar Wai. Eric features the topic of first love in his first movie: a sleepwalker guided through the night by a lonely admirer is bizarre yet romantic, while a married grocer facing the vengeful first love that he once rejected is heartbreaking.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a Mr McDreamy Training Academy using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into Mr McDreamies with hilarious results.

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return

programme.title: Princess & 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lams daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile Hand of God to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the Hand of God?

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: Heroes Of The East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: A Place To Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his wife Gan Lian Zhu are the famous Twin Swords in the martial arts world. One day, they stumble upon a kidnapping plot at the Red Lotus Temple and Lian Zhu is held captive. Wu successfully escapes to find the Gan family for help, not knowing that he is sending them into an ambush by the kidnappers. Can he finally save Lian Zhu?

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Na Cha And The Seven Devils
programme.desc: While stealing one magical peach from a mystic tree in Heaven, Little Na Cha accidentally drops seven others on Earth, which transformed seven different animals into seven devils. Na Cha must hunt the devils down in ten days or his father will be punished by the King of Heaven. Can Na Cha complete his mission?

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: The Trail Of The Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fungs life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Web Of Death
programme.desc: To rule the martial arts world, the Head of the Snake Sect seeks to possess a deadly plant called Five Poison Web, spreading rumours on its whereabouts. Brothers Xiong and Kit are sent to investigate. Xiong falls in love with Su who has a clue of where the plant is, but she accidentally hurts Kit when seeking the plant, devastating Xiong.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeepers daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlords home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this young auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: Call Of The Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: To Kill A Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: A former Monkey Kung Fu master crippled by a ruthless villain is convinced by his young disciple to teach him monkey kung fu, so as to avenge his shame.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Peng fought against many swordsmen and won, so he could not accept his first defeat and wanted to commit suicide. It is at this time that Peng meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader. They fall in love and want to get married. The Sect leader gives Peng the Full Moon Scimitar on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.desc: Tamil Action Film, Starring, Mohanlal, Chetan Hansraj, Nayan Rosh T M, Siddique. Sachidanadan & Others

programme.title: We'Re The Millers
programme.desc: Jason Sudeikis stars in this buzz-worthy comedy as a small-time suburban pot-dealer who likes to keep a low profile. When he's jumped by some gutter punks who steal his cash and his stash, he finds himself in deep trouble with his supplier, Brad (Ed Helms). In order to make amends, the small-time peddler must become a big-time drug smuggler by bringing Brad's latest shipment in from Mexico. Enlisting his neighbors a cynical stripper (Jennifer Aniston), a streetwise teen (Emma Roberts) and a wannabe customer (Will Poulter) he comes up with a foolproof plan. One fake wife, two pretend kids and a ginormous shiny RV later, "the Millers" are headed south of the border for a Fourth of July weekend that's sure to end with a bang or two!

programme.title: A Man Apart
programme.desc: Sean Vetter and Demetrius Hicks are a pair of DEA agents who think they've made the bust of a lifetime when they capture 'Memo' Lucero, a multi-millionaire drug lord who controlled most of the narcotics traffic along the border of Mexico and the United States. However, with Lucero behind bars, a new and decidedly more dangerous underworld kingpin rises to take his place, and Diablo, soon proves to be even more dangerous than Lucero when he orders his gunmen to assassinate Vetter. While Vetter escapes unharmed, his wife is killed, and Vetter is thrown deep into despair. Now Vetter is obsessed with bringing Diablo to justice, and he's willing to do anything to bring him down - even if it means teaming up with Lucero.

programme.title: The Hangover Part Iii
programme.desc: It's been two years since the guys prowled the seamy side of Las Vegas in a roofie haze and recovered from being kidnapped, shot at and chased by drug-dealing mobsters in Bangkok. Phil, Stu and Doug are happily living uneventful lives at home. The only member of the Wolfpack who's not content is Alan. Still lacking a sense of purpose, the group's black sheep has ditched his meds and given in to his natural impulses in a big way which, for Alan, means no boundaries, no filters and no judgment until a personal crisis forces him to finally seek the help he needs. And who better than his three best friends to make sure he takes the first step. This time, there's no bachelor party. No wedding. What could possibly go wrong? But when the Wolfpack hits the road, all bets are off.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Temple Of Doom
programme.desc: In this box office smash, Indiana Jones must rescue some missing children kidnapped by religious terrorists in the Orient who happen to possess some stolen, sacred jewels.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Last Crusade
programme.desc: After settling down to a quieter life, Indy is thrust back into action when his father mysteriously disappears while on a quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Kingdom Of The Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Famed archaeologist/adventurer Dr. Henry 'Indiana' Jones is called back into action when he becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The alumni cast of a cult space TV show have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help.

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: After an accident at a nearby oil-drilling site displaces a strange and subterranean creature with a taste and a talent for speed, Tripp may have just found the key to getting out of town and a most unlikely friend.

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: In 1942, after falling in love with a French agent during a dangerous North African mission, an Allied counter-intelligence agent is quietly notified that the woman he has married and had a baby with is likely a Nazi spy.

programme.title: John Grisham's The Rainmaker
programme.desc: An idealistic young lawyer, taking on the case of an indigent family whose son is denied medical care by a powerful insurance company and dies, uncovers a multi-billion dollar insurance scam.

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: After an accident at a nearby oil-drilling site displaces a strange and subterranean creature with a taste and a talent for speed, Tripp may have just found the key to getting out of town and a most unlikely friend.

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: In 1942, after falling in love with a French agent during a dangerous North African mission, an Allied counter-intelligence agent is quietly notified that the woman he has married and had a baby with is likely a Nazi spy.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: Every district in the nation of Panem must send a boy and girl to fight to the death in the annual Hunger Games competition. Jennifer Lawrence is 16-year-old Katniss Everdeen, who volunteers to take her younger sisters place in the games.

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: The world's foremost authority on structural security accepts a job to break out of an ultra-secret, high-tech facility. When he agrees, he is incarcerated in the most secret and secure prison on the planetand no one knows it is just a test.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Smoker - Mount Nyiragongo in the Democratic Republic of Congo erupts. It engulfs the nearby city of Goma with lava, taking thirty-three lives and destroying almost four-thousand homes. Chris arrives in Goma to find everyone else evacuating. After surveying the destruction, Chris joins volcanologists on an expedition to the source of the eruption.

programme.title: Eden: Untamed Planet S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Alaska: Last American Frontier - In southeast Alaska, there's an ice-bound Eden that harbors possibly the richest temperate rainforests of all.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep11
programme.desc: Melt-in-your-mouth chocolate mints are lovingly finished by hand. In a unique antipasto, the star ingredient goes from field to jar all on the same day; Aussie-style soft licorice owes its success to a blunder Down Under; and find out the secret to making perfectly seasoned plantain chips.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep12
programme.desc: Peanut butter cups feature an amazing history and a one-of-a-kind butterscotch coating; starting with giant slabs of butter, three million Sara Lee pound cakes are produced every year; three types of citrus go from tree to jar at this Florida orchard; and a butter chicken cooking sauce is made at a university research facility.

programme.title: A Perfect Planet S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Sun - From the frozen poles to the searing deserts, The Sun shows how animals have come up with strategies to survive the uneven amounts of sunlight that fall on our planet.

programme.desc: India - Joanna follows the Spice Trail to India.

programme.desc: See artisan chocolatiers turn liquid into luscious raspberry creams; tons of bagel crisps roll off a North Carolina assembly line every year; and find out how science and sunshine are mixed to create yellow food colouring.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep14
programme.desc: Five million iconic throat drops are produced every day; it takes dozens of tries to perfect these gluten-free veggie pockets; the recipe for peanut butter chocolates is top secret; and the key to an old school apple butter is in the details.

programme.title: Zoo Quest in Colour S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Part 1 - During the 1950s a young Sir David Attenborough and a team from London Zoo worked to conserve rare and exotic animals by bringing them to the UK. Part 1/2.

programme.desc: Frenchness - Griff Rhys Jones continues his journey across Canada, heading to Quebec and Montreal to experience the French Canadian way of life, which includes sampling poutine, Maple syrup and the obsession with ice hockey.

programme.title: Universe S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Big Bang: Before the Dawn - Professor Brian Cox journeys across the vastness of time and space.

programme.desc: Visit the historic Michigan home of Alphabits cereal; the secret to a jet-black fettuccine is 3 litres of squid ink; every jar of a zesty garden mix is artfully packed by hand; and an Indiana candy factory produces more than 50 million gummy peaches per week.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep16
programme.desc: Once discontinued, the strawberry cheesecake frozen treat is back by popular demand; find out the secret to irresistible sea salt caramels; allergen-free bars pack all the satisfaction of a cinnamon bun; and a Toronto duo has put a modern twist on a Jewish culinary classic.

programme.title: Earth's Tropical Islands S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Madagascar - Journey across Madagascar, the oldest island on Earth. Over time, it has given rise to more unique plants and animals - from its famed lemurs to colourful chameleons - than any other island.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Coromandel - Marine Biologist Jacky Geurts delves into Whangamata's mangrove wars and gets to grips with the treacherous surf rip at Hotwater Beach. Meanwhile, geologist Hamish Campbell digs for this country's earliest human history on Great Mercury Island.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Horrific wildfires devastate Greece, hikers in Turkey are stranded by a flash flood and a tornado rips off roofs and catapults cars in Canada.

programme.desc: Into the Night - Sue Aikens must protect Kavik from the dangers that lurk in the shadows. The Hailstones use the cover of night to search for food under the ice.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Great Addo Elephant - The Addo Elephant National Park sits in the heart of the Eastern Cape of South Africa, covering over 1600 square kilometres of land. While the elephants are the stars of the park, Addo is the only reserve in the world where visitors can see all of the big seven: lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo, white rhino, southern right whale, and great white shark.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Koala 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Koala Country - Despite being one of Australias best-known marsupials, koalas live only in the east and southeast parts of the continent. Learn how their lives and behaviors vary in these different regions.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Turtle's Legacy - The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years. But now, all seven of the surviving species are endangered.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Battle to Save a Sea Lion - Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle - Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep4
programme.desc: India - Welcome to India a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare. Monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jungle Juniors - Every year, more than 200,000 monkeys in Peru are trafficked illegally. Almost all are babies. Watch as these little ones learn to survive without their moms and try to make new friends along the way.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 Ep3
programme.desc: God's Darling: Beetles - Beetles have inhabited the Earth for more than 240 million years. There are around 380,000 kinds of beetles known to scientists and every year hundreds of new species are discovered. One fourth of the worlds animals are beetles. They have conquered almost every corner and every habitat on the planet and they have survived every global disaster. What is it that makes them so successful?

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Hollow Heart - This is the incredible story of a tree that has been around for eight hundred years that can withstand the harshest conditions and that is more loved by insects, birds and animals than any otherthe enormous Baobab. Rooted on the savannah of Malilangwe Game Reserve in southern Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Great Addo Elephant - The Addo Elephant National Park sits in the heart of the Eastern Cape of South Africa, covering over 1600 square kilometres of land. programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Coast - Massive elephant seals go nose to nose to win the title of beachmaster, and giant petrels earn the nickname, murderous garbagemen. Meanwhile, a female humpback goes to extremes to protect her calf from amorous males.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Canada - Canada, where summer is short and time is tight any time is the right time to fight. The mighty North provides the setting for bison, bald eagles, and polar bears to wage some of the most heavy-duty fighting in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep7
programme.desc: South America - From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hot Day in the New World - Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Tale of Two Penguins - At the waters edge a brave group of male penguins gather, preparing to make the dangerous journey ashore. With many threats ahead, there is safety in number and these petite penguins have important business to attend. Its time to breed and they must find a burrow before the females arrive.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Koala 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Breeding Season - Koalas may seem solitary and inert, but mating season brings a dramatic shift in their behavior, leading to movement, contact, and conflict. As breeding season begins, follow two large males on a mission to mate.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 3 Ep1
programme.desc: Wild Coast of South Africa - The Wild Coast of South Africa stretches for 170 miles. Here, the waters of the Indian and the Atlantic converge, forcing powerful waves towards the shoreline. This is where the Mozambique-based manta ray researcher Andrea Marshall hopes to conduct her first-ever manta ray expedition within South Africas borders...

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Battle to Save a Sea Lion - Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle - Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Koala 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Breeding Season - Koalas may seem solitary and inert, but mating season brings a dramatic shift in their behavior, leading to movement, contact, and conflict. As breeding season begins, follow two large males on a mission to mate.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 3 Ep1
programme.desc: Wild Coast of South Africa - The Wild Coast of South Africa stretches for 170 miles. Here, the waters of the Indian and the Atlantic converge, forcing powerful waves towards the shoreline. This is where the Mozambique-based manta ray researcher Andrea Marshall hopes to conduct her first-ever manta ray expedition within South Africas borders...

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawatwhi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cook Islands/ Kki 'Airani - Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Canada - Canada, where summer is short and time is tight any time is the right time to fight. The mighty North provides the setting for bison, bald eagles, and polar bears to wage some of the most heavy-duty fighting in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hot Day in the New World - Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Tale of Two Penguins - At the waters edge a brave group of male penguins gather, preparing to make the dangerous journey ashore. With many threats ahead, there is safety in number and these petite penguins have important business to attend. Its time to breed and they must find a burrow before the females arrive.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep7
programme.desc: South America - From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Battle to Save a Sea Lion - Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Southeast Asia - With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep9
programme.desc: USA - The USA is big on flash and spectacle. Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops. Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter. Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers on the dance floor. Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hippo Lagoon - Secluded and sheltered, away from the hustle and bustle of Zambias Luangwa River, Kasikizi lagoon is home to a small community of diverse wildlife. At the height of the wet season, its full to the brim with water a peaceful spot, ideal for two old male hippos who wallow in its watery depths. The lagoon is their sanctuary, a world away from the more violent life theyve left behind at the main river, where they had to face aggressive beachmasters, willing to fight to protect their territory...

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Drought Begins - The Luangwa Valley in Zambia experiences one of the toughest dry seasons imaginable. Seven months with no rain and spiraling temperatures. And with this years El Nino conditions the drought is threatening to be even more intense than usual.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in the Furnace - Its October in Zambias Luangwa Valley. The hottest and harshest time of year. But this year dry season conditions are exacerbated by a global El Nio event the Valley is in the throes of drought. Theres been no rain since April and desperate animals are drawn to the only remaining source of water in the Valley the dwindling Luangwa River. The last remaining deep pools are inhabited by hippos hundreds squashed together in the only water deep enough to submerge them. As tempers flare and skirmishes break out, its a dangerous place for baby hippos, dwarfed by the three-tonne adults.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Coming of the Rains - The rains are late. It is the most brutal time of year. Babies born into drought face starvation. Everything is desperate for rain. When it arrives, it is a downpour on an enormous scale. Alien creatures emerge into a different world. The wet season begins.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Arid Heart - From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australias most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Over Australia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Great Divide - Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Start of Trauma Season - Scramble as the ER team tends to a spring flood of patients. Watch vet Phil stabilize an ailing joey as the rescue team fends off a rude kangaroo. Shadow senior vet Tim, who treats a cat-scratched bandicoot and snakes a keelback out of a grate.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Operation Pelican - Head out with rescuer Jo to scoop up a pelican whos swallowed a fish hook, then see Sam free a newborn bat tangled in a fence. Follow vet Tim, who aids a surly koala with an eye infection, and watch a lumpy python give newbie Ruby a load of trouble.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn - An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep66
programme.desc: Fifi Misses Me Not - Bumble has gone off on a pollen collecting expedition. He wishes Fifi was with him. Meanwhile, back in the garden, Fifi is missing her best friend too.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep67
programme.desc: Pirate Primrose - The tots are playing at pirates, all except Primrose, who is being a princess, naturally. But guess which tot has the best pirating skills when they are needed

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep68
programme.desc: Primrose Loses It - Primrose has broken her new necklace and lost the beads. She is unconsolable. Violet holds a make and do party to replace the necklace

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep69
programme.desc: Dr Webby - Bumble's sneezing has got so bad, it is keeping everyone awake at night. Webby gives Fifi a recipe for a cure for sneezes will it work?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep1
programme.desc: How Do We Make A Boat? - Jess and Horace want to play Boat Racing on the pond - but first the need work out how to make a boat! Some things are too heavy, some are too light having tried lots of options and worked out that they need something light and boat shaped, they make Mimi's paper hats into boats for their boat race. Perfect!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep2
programme.desc: How Can We All Keep Warm? - It's Willow's apple picking party today, but some of the friends just are too chilly to go. Jess tries to work out how to keep them all warm, should they cover themselves in mud just like frogs do? Should they wrap themselves up in straw? Or might running around be the trick to getting them all toasty warm?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep3
programme.desc: What's Happened To Chloe The Caterpillar? - Jess wants to introduce Willow to his new friend, Chloe the caterpillar. But where's Chloe gone? He searches for her in all the places she might be, where he's visited her before, where there might be juicey leaves she'd like to eat but it's not until a butterfly breaks out of a little Chloe-shaped-sack that Jess realises that Chloe's just changed!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep4
programme.desc: When Will My Coloured Stripes Come Back? - Jess is playing puddle jumping, dodging the rain to have fun on a gloomy day when suddenly, just as the rain's stopping, the sun comes out and at the same time he sees a beautiful rainbow in the sky. He's desperate to show his friends, and it's not until he works out you need sunshine and rain at the same time to make a rainbow that he can show his friends the beautiful coloured shape in the sky.

programme.title: Olivia Ep9
programme.desc: Olivia Claus - It's almost Christmas, and Olivia and Ian can't wait for Santa to come. But there's one thing that Santa can't bring Olivia's lost toy, her beloved monkey Mathilda. Olivia imagines herself to be a Santa Claus who returns lost toys. On Christmas morning Olivia finds new gifts under the tree and Mathilda right under her nose.

programme.title: Olivia Ep10
programme.desc: Olivia Takes Ballet - Olivia is determined to dance just like the ballerinas she's seen in a ballet; the only thing she needs is a partner. Luckily, Uncle Garret (a professional football player) is visiting, and the two of them dance a surprisingly graceful pas de deux for Olivia's whole class.

programme.title: Olivia Ep11
programme.desc: Olivia And The Crystal Ball - While Olivia and her brothers play fortune teller, baby William accidentally breaks Dad's new bowling trophy, When a friendly police officer shows up at the door selling raffle tickets, Olivia is convinced that he's come for William, and she devises a scheme to keep William safe from the arms of the law.

programme.title: Olivia Ep12
programme.desc: Olivia Packs Up - Tired of having to share with her brother Ian, Olivia sets out on a trip around theblock in search of a place free from little brothers. She imagines herself crossing a vast desert by camel which isn't all it's cracked up to be and eventually decides that having a little brother might not be so bad after all.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep1
programme.desc: Why Elephant Has A Trunk - You see there was a time when Elephant had no nose. He couldn't swat away the flies, or scrub his belly he couldn't even blow his nose. Then one day snappy Crocodile snapped! Crocodile pulled and he pulled and he pulled until Ker-doing!!! Crocodile let go and Elephant's nose was all long and wiggly! And that's why Elephant has a trunk. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep2
programme.desc: Why Snake Has No Legs - You see there was a time when Snake did have legs hundreds and hundreds of them. But poor old Snake had no eyes, not a single eye on his head. Then on the day of the great Tinga Tinga Festival of Colours Snake quite literally bumped into Millipede who was stuck in a hole. They decided to swap eyes and legs just for one day. So that Snake could see all the wonderful colours and Millipede could run all over Tinga Tinga. But when Snake came back to return Millipede's eyes, Millepede couldn't be found anywhere! So to this day, Snake has no legs. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep3
programme.desc: Why Hippo Has No Hair - You see there was a time when Hippo did have hair lots of hair! She was always harumphingly hot. Then one hot night while Hippo was sleeping a spark from the fire caught the end of her hairy tail! Hippo was on fire! She ran through the bush until SPLOSH! Hippo jumped in the waterhole. And from that day on Hippo stayed in the cool waters without a single hair on her hide. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep4
programme.desc: Why Tortoise Has A Broken Shell - You see there was a time when Tortoise's shell was all shiny and smooth. One day Tortoise discovered the birds were having a Feast in the Heavens and he tricked the Birds into making him a pair of wings. Greedy Tortoise raced the birds beyond the clouds and scoffed the whole feastt! When the Birds found out Tortoise had to jump off a cloud until BOOF!!! He landed on his shiny shell. All the animals pieced Tortoise's shell back together but from that day on Tortoise's shell was all bumpy and broken and he never moved speedily again. Tales from Africa.

programme.desc: The Imposter / Frenemy - When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep66
programme.desc: Julien 2.0 - King Julien wants a doover to become King JULIEN 2.0 and actually listen to his people. But when everyone feels their voice is the most important the kingdom becomes a chaotic mess

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep69
programme.desc: The Gavel of Justice - Someone stole Bebe's gavel and used it to break a window at the academy! Everyone seems to suspect Alex ... but Pru is certain he's innocent.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep40
programme.desc: Gibraltar ROCKS! - When Wally and Wenda head to WWS Great Magic Key Vault, located in Gibraltar, to find Whitebeard a key for his birthday, they find that Odlulu has already cleaned out the vault; the Wanderers must round up all these keys, and theyll have to do it in time for Whitebeards surprise birthday party.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep16
programme.desc: Fast Franks Fixit / Tail-Kwondo - When Tag is left in charge of the Pawston Pawtomotive for the day, Frank and Beans open up a rival garage and take all the business. But when all the cars around Pawston break down because of Frank's shoddy mechanic work, Tag and Scooch have to go around town to fix all his mistakes. \ Scooch wants to be a Tail-kwondo master like his hero, Master Wag, but he can't break a biscuit with his tail. Tag helps train him (and his tail), and they even track down Master Wag who gives Scooch a good luck charm. But when Scooch loses the good luck charm before his tail-kwondo test, he needs to find a way to believe in himself.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher it! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep14
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 2 - The Rescue Riders plan to team up with the Slinkwings when an angry Grumblegard threatens Huttsgalor. But their old enemies may be up to new tricks.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep27
programme.desc: The Case Of The Clockwork Mouse Mystery - Everyone in Toyland is excited about the first ever Winter Light Festival - except its organiser, Clockwork Mouse who is moving at super fast speed. Noddy investigates why she's acting so strangely. He works out that she's been trying to move at triple speed to get everything sorted in time. Noddy helps her realise that she doesn't have to do all the festival preparations on her own. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep28
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Smartysaurus - For the Night of the Stars, Noddy invites all his friends at home to look at the stars through his telescope. Smartysaurus will bring a map of the stars so everyone can spot them. But when the party starts, Smartysaurus hasn't arrived. Noddy investigates and finds out his big friend couldn't fit through his small front door so she'd shrunk herself! Noddy has to help Smartysaurus get back to her proper size and find a way for everyone to enjoy the Night of the Stars together. Good job, Noddy.

programme.desc: Skunked! / Neighborhood Bird Watch - Archibald cant wait to celebrate his Hatch Day with his family inside an impossibly fun theme park. With Archibald as their new recruit, they attempt to expose the neighbors suspicious shenanigans.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep3
programme.desc: Royal Review / Funishment - Poppy faces her first royal review as Queen and sets out to ensure 100 happiness in Troll VillagePoppy must figure out how to handle crime in Troll Village when Cooper steals a pie.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep11
programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep30
programme.desc: Turn And Burn - Stoick, Hiccup and Snotlout search for Spitelout when he goes missing, and ultimately find him on a distant island battling a fiery Singetail dragon.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep54
programme.desc: Sandbusted - When Hiccup is summoned to the Northern Markets to look into a curse that causes people to disappear, he is sucked down into a cavern of the fearsome Sandbuster

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep30
programme.desc: Mystery! On the Yard Express / Lindsay Joins the Band - While passengers on board a fancy train, the Mighty Ones become a part of a classic whodunit. / With an impending visit from Brehts mother, Lindsay discovers she has more fun with her next door neighbors.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep54
programme.desc: Not A Drill - The threat of monsters from the Netherworld portal has Puss running the townspeople through some crazy emergency drills, which no one takes seriously.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep70
programme.desc: Make Room For Fifi - There is a horrid smell in Fifi's garden. Fifi goes to stay with Primrose and Violet while they try and work out where the smell is coming from. What could be causing it?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep71
programme.desc: Slugsy's Song - Slugsy has found something really special. Only Primrose can be persuaded to go and see it with him. Even she is surprised by what she sees!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep72
programme.desc: Stingo's Bridge - Webby has told Pip the story of the 3 Billy Goats Gruff. Soon a troll takes up residence under the bridge in the garden and demands food payment every time the tots cross. Can Fifi get to the bottom of the mystery?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep73
programme.desc: Violet's Flower Festival - Violet is organising a flower festival. She is so busy helping the other tots with their blooms she has neglected hers. Will her flower open in time for the big day?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep5
programme.desc: Who Did I Hear In The Big Hollow Log? - Jess is searching for Horace by the pond but he's nowhere to be found. When he calls into a hollow log and his voice echo's back, Jess thinks it's the voice of a new friend and sets about trying to work out where the friend is. By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep6
programme.desc: What Can We Do With Mimi's Rubbish? - Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine / Shopping List - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.desc: Patnocchio / ChefBob - Plankton tells Patrick he's his conscience so he can convince the wooden-headed star to steal him a Krabby Patty. // When Mr. Krabs puts in an open kitchen, SpongeBob gets stage fright and has to invent a new persona.

programme.desc: To Dad and Back / Survivoring - Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.desc: Who's a Big Boy? - Patrick hits an unnatural growth spurt in his late adolescence.

programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Costa learns about wetlands; Millie meets a native flower grower; Josh returns to a sandy soil transformation; Jerry fixes an aging garden; Tammy shares tips to stop weeds; and we meet a photographer of farming and forests.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep32
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep29
programme.desc: Join Michael Rowland, Lisa Millar, Tony Armstrong, Madeleine Morris and Nate Byrne for some of the best conversations as we hear from some of the most informed and entertaining guests who have appeared on News Breakfast.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast: Early Ep34
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Kathryn Robinson and Emma Rebellato bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Daniela Intili.

programme.title: ABC News Ep68
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We bring you the headlines and latest on the day's top stories, plus breaking news and live reports from the scene as events unfold.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep32
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents a weekly roundup of stories filed by the ABC's international correspondents posted across the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India, Indonesia and more.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep68
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep30
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep32
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: The Pacific Ep10
programme.desc: Johnson Raela and Alice Lolohea cover the stories that matter to the Pacific, drawing on a network of journalists with deep regional expertise to bring you the region's most up-to-date information every week.

programme.title: ABC News Ep68
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Landline Ep28
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep4
programme.desc: The first Republican Presidential Primary Debate is on in Milwaukee, but who will qualify and who will appear? Around a dozen candidates take on frontrunner Donald Trump to be the GOP nominee. Chas and John break it all down.

programme.title: Paramedics Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - A mysterious young woman found unresponsive on a bus has Carina baffled. Matt becomes concerned after a frightened car crash survivor loses her memory. Risky and Nicola are confronted by an unwanted intruder.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 24 - Brisbane Lions v St Kilda Ep138
programme.desc: The Brisbane Lions are in the hunt for a Top 2 finish and to earn home ground advantage through the finals series. The Lions host St Kilda at the Gabba, as the Saints look to secure their spot in the Top 8 and make finals.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 24 - Geelong v Western Bulldogs Ep139
programme.desc: After 24 Rounds, it all comes down to this for Geelong and the Western Bulldogs. The Reigning Premiers the Cats host the Dogs on a Saturday night - with the makeup of the Finals series hinging on the results this weekend.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Winter Special Ep21
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Josh visits a leafy loft, Tammy grows food in the shade, Clarence plants up a tree stump, Costa tours a Bollywood backyard, Millie preps for spring, and we meet a paleoecologist who sees the natural world as a history book.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep17
programme.desc: We are your passport to the world. Our stories, told through the ABC's network of foreign correspondents, will take you to incredible places where you'll meet the people and see the forces shaping our world.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep30
programme.desc: The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep29
programme.desc: Everybody loves it until they're on it! Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment, bringing you a fearless critique of the week's journalism, issues and events in the news. Presented by Paul Barry.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep68
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Bento Expo
programme.desc: In this special episode, Marc meets a skilled soup bento maker, Ariga Kaoru. She's known for her easy yet tasty recipes for soup made in vacuum flasks. Marc prepares an original curry soup bento.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Japan loves baseball! But gear can be so costly that some young players give up. Yonezawaya Tomohiro and Oki Satoshi refurbish and sell old gloves at a low price, so that every child can... play ball!

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Luque vs Dos Anjos
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to UFC APEX in Las Vegas this weekend with a clash of top ranked welterweight contenders as No. 10 Vicente Luque welcomes former UFC lightweight champion Rafael Dos Anjos into a rankings challenge. In the co-main event at featherweight, fan favorite Hall of Famer Cub Swanson squares off against surging KO artist Hakeem Dawodu. UFC FIGHT NIGHT: LUQUE vs DOS ANJOS will air live in Asia on Sunday, August 13. The main card begins at 7am and the prelims start at 4am. Below are the event materials to assist in your coverage.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Luque vs Dos Anjos
